import storyboardImg from "./img/root/storyboard.jpg"; import storyboardMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/storyboard_mobile.jpg"; import designVariationsImg from "./img/root/DesignVariations.jpg"; import userLoginImg from "./img/root/userLogin.jpg"; import userLoginMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/userLogin_mobile.jpg"; import homePageImg from "./img/root/homePage.jpg"; import homePageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/home_page_mobile.jpg"; import birthdayFeatureImg from "./img/root/birthdayFeature.jpg"; import birthdayFeatureMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/birthdayFeature_mobile.jpg"; import sendMessageImg from "./img/root/sendMessage.jpg"; import sendMessageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/sendMessage_mobile.jpg"; import messagePageImg from "./img/root/messagePage.jpg"; import messagePageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/messagePage_mobile.jpg"; import memoryPageImg from "./img/root/memoryPage.jpg"; import memoryPageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/memoryPage_mobile.jpg"; import profilePageImg from "./img/root/profilePage.jpg"; import profilePageMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/profilePage_mobile.jpg"; import twoProcedureMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/twoProcedure_mobile.jpg"; import designIssuesImg from "./img/root/DesignIssues.jpg"; import designIssuesMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/DesignIssues_mobile.jpg"; import improvement1Img from "./img/root/improvement1.jpg"; import improvement1MobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/improvement1_mobile.jpg"; import improvement2Img from "./img/root/improvement2.jpg"; const RootProject = () => { return ( Root Project | Portfolio {/* 설명 섹션 */}
{/* 아이디어 및 상호작용 */}

Idea & Interaction Framework

Based on our interview and research with families living abroad, our intended users are seniors over 75 years old who have family members located on various parts of the world. This app helps them feel connected to family despite geographical and physical limitations.

{/* Persona 섹션 */}

Persona

Persona 01: Judy

Judy is a 75-year-old single woman with children living in Japan and Seattle. She feels isolated due to the pandemic and has trouble connecting with her family due to technology limitations.

Persona 02: Jason

Jason is an 85-year-old married senior living in Vancouver with four children living in different time zones. For him, it’s challenging to greet his family members due to time zone differences. He wishes for a messaging function that allows sending messages at specific scheduled times to reach his family members at the right moments.

{/* Sketches 섹션 */}

Sketches

Here’s our initial pen-and-paper sketches we developed for our ROOT interface. It includes the main home page, profile viewing options, access to photo albums, and a section for playing games with family members.

{/* Storyboard 섹션 */}

Storyboard

This storyboard illustrates a scenario where Judy uses the ROOT app to send a morning message to her daughter in Japan, timing it so that it won’t disturb her late at night.

{/* Design Variations 섹션 */}

Design Variations

We explored several design variations, experimenting with color schemes, interaction elements, and iconography to enhance usability for seniors.

{/* Style Guide 섹션 */}

Style Guide

We chose Roboto as the main font for readability and applied warm colors like orange to convey friendliness and approachability.

{/* User Flow 섹션 */}

User Flow

User Login

The login page prompts first-time users to register and verifies their credentials. Returning users can simply log in.

Home Page

The home page provides users with quick access to family members' profiles, where they can send messages, make calls, and view their relatives’ time zones and weather to ensure smooth communication across locations.

Birthday Feature

A unique feature includes birthday reminders, which highlight family member birthdays with a cake icon and a special message upon opening the app.

Send Message

To send a message, users can type or use a voice-to-text feature for accessibility. The message page also confirms delivery time for each message sent.

Message Page

The message page allows users to view ongoing conversations, pin important chats, and schedule group calls and video calls with family members.

Memory Page

The memory page enables families to share weekly updates through photos, which can be liked and commented on by other family members.

Profile Page

On the profile page, users can update their personal information, preferences, and adjust notification settings. The edit profile option allows them to personalize their details.

{/* User Study Plan 섹션 */}

User Study Plan

Our usability testing aimed to evaluate ROOT’s application based on feedback from users with family abroad. Six participants participated through both in-person and video call methods.

{/* Procedure 섹션 */}

Procedure

The user study consisted of four parts: introduction, pre-test interview, testing tasks with our prototype, and a post-test interview.

{/* Design Issues 섹션 */}

Design Issues

The user study highlighted several design issues: a lack of indicators for creating new group chats, unclear icons for selecting scheduled times, and inconsistent design layouts for individual vs. group chats.

{/* Improvement 섹션 */}

Improvement

Improvement 1

To address the memory page issues, we redesigned the chat layout for consistency and added a clearer option for creating group chats.

Improvement 2

For the message-sending interaction, we introduced a step-by-step path and added an option for “customize time” to simplify scheduling messages.

Improvement 3

In the memory page, we replaced calendar icons with family profile images to enhance user clarity, and included subheadings for uploading photos and videos.

{/* Observation 섹션 */}

Our Observation

Remote testing with seniors presented communication challenges, especially over video calls. Younger participants were generally more familiar with remote applications, making it easier for them to navigate.

); }; export default RootProject;
